title: T-Mobile's new family plan may save you $1,000 over Verizon and AT&T - here's how to qualify
contentSnippet: T-Mobile's Better Value plan starts at $140 a month for three lines, with a five-year price guarantee. Here's the fine print.
content: T-Mobile's Better Value plan starts at $140 a month for three lines, with a five-year price guarantee. Here's the fine print.
